sqlMap.select: select com_num,title,content,writer,reg_date,readcount,recommend from community order by com_num desc
select com_num,title,content,writer,reg_date,readcount,recommend from community where btype='1' order by com_num desc
select com_num,title,content,writer,reg_date,readcount,recommend from community where btype='2' order by com_num desc
select com_num,title,content,writer,reg_date,readcount,recommend from community where btype='3' order by com_num desc
sqlMap.update: update community set readcount=readcount+1 where com_num =#com_num#
update community set recommend=recommend+1 , readcount=readcount-1 where com_num =#com_num#
sqlMap.select: select rep_num,content,ref,step_num,emp_name,re_step,re_num,re_date,re_level,r from (select rep_num,content,ref,step_num,emp_name,re_step,re_num,re_date,re_level,rownum r from (select * from reply order by step_num desc, re_step asc) order by step_num desc, re_step asc ) where r >= 1 and r <= 10 and ref=#ref#
sqlMap.update: update reply set re_step=re_step+1 where re_level =1
sqlMap.select: select emp_name from emp where emp_num=#emp_num#
